title: Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle
summaries: The Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle is a Hardmode, post-Plantera pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Grinch to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, a red balloon will carry the Baby Grinch to catch up with them. The Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle is dropped by the Ice Queen during the Frost Moon event with a 0.95–1.67% (3.33– 6.67%) chance depending on the current wave.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
